name: Army Navy & Air Force Veterans in Canada Unit 100

owner.name: Army Navy & Air Force Veterans in Canada Unit 100 (Owner)

address: Army Navy & Air Force Veterans in Canada Unit 100, 2211 Kingsway, Vancouver, BC V5N 2T6

featured_reviews.review_id:
Support Our Troops both past and present.

When one considers with gratitude the freedoms which are enjoyed today in the culture that we have -  with the democracy that we hold dear to heart - its important to remember that we are living the legacy of giants who came before us.

This is the world that I wanted to leave for my children, one that is imperfect, yet strives to move towards an unilateral improvement for the good of this world, our species and our god. Some may see our modern day Legions or other gathering spots for veterans of war as bygone institutions. Places where you go to get a beer and a 50/50 ticket for a meat draw and that's it, but no.

Look beneath what is visible on the surface and what you see are old friends stitched together from the bonds of war, men and women who have seen inordinate levels of loss, yet are bound by their camaraderie and companionship to meet and greet each other despite the ongoing battles this world invariably succumbs to. This is what people miss.

So make your way down to the local arena of friendship. I highly recommend it.
featured_reviews.review_text:

Some may see our modern day Legions or other gathering spots for veterans of war as bygone institutions. Places where you go to get a beer and a 50/50 ticket for a meat draw and that's it, but no.

Look beneath what is visible on the surface and what you see are old friends stitched together from the bonds of war, men and women who have seen inordinate levels of loss, yet are bound by their camaraderie and companionship to meet and greet each other despite the ongoing battles this world invariably succumbs to. This is what people miss.

So make your way down to the local arena of friendship. I highly recommend it.

featured_reviews.review_id:
Awesome karaoke room Wednesday and every second Saturday 7-close
Great hostess (Marlene Friend)
Cheap drinks
Massive song selection and best of all.  . .
An extremely appreciative audience.

featured_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you for your review. We hope to have karaoke back soon.

featured_reviews.review_id: Very good legion, complete with vets, cheap beer, TVs, and long board shuffle board. This legion even has a kitchen, although I can't vouch for their food. Worth checking out if you like legions but don't want to put up with the hipsters at the one on Main Street.
featured_reviews.review_text: Very good legion, complete with vets, cheap beer, TVs, and long board shuffle board. This legion even has a kitchen, although I can't vouch for their food. Worth checking out if you like legions but don't want to put up with the hipsters at the one on Main Street.

featured_reviews.review_id: $4/hr to play on some very well kept snooker tables at the back.  You'll need loonies or cash to get change for loonies to put in the machine that turns the lights on so you can play.  Make sure you add loonies to the machine that matches its corresponding table number.  $1 = 15 minutes

featured_reviews.review_id: Great staff. Very lucky in the weekly draws. Won large this night. Thanks for the laughs as well. A Great EASTVAN pub. They love it when you support local. Too bad. I bleed Blue&White. GO LEAFS GO!!  VANTECH GRAD 86
